page.title: 20GAMES WE PLAY/CREDITS
page.content: We play all different games;{Stuck In {The Mud}is one of them,this is how we play it:{You have two posts 8 metres {apart.Everybody stands behind the post {to begin with.One person is it.When {the person who is it touches you,you {stop,and stand with your legs apart. {You are not allowed to move until {somebody crawls through your legs.} This game is called {Cowboy Joe}that we've made up ,you play it like this:{ {you skip in time and do what the song {says.This is the song;Cowboy Joe from {Mexico,hands up stick them {up,dont forget to pick them up,and you {keep saying it until you go wrong.When {it says hands up,you put your hands {up. The items in this project were written by the children of St.Nicholas C.P.School Lutton and Gedney Church End School in cooperation July 1985.
